articles.description: All the latest football news and build-up to the quarter-finals of the EFL Cup and news conferences with Ange Postecoglou and Enzo Maresca.

articles.description: Marcus Rashford says he is "ready for a new challenge" as he is asked about his Manchester United future.

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at what adjustments Tyson Fury has made in preparing for Saturday's heavyweight rematch with Oleksandr Usyk.
articles.title: Fury vs Usyk 2: What adjustments must Briton make to win heavyweight rematch?

articles.description: India off-spinner Ravichandran Ashwin retires from international cricket as the seventh-highest Test wicket-taker of all time.

articles.title: Arne Slot: How Liverpool boss has changed Reds since Jurgen Klopp

articles.description: Keely Hodgkinson says she has the 800m world record in her sights after the Olympic champion was named BBC Sports Personality of the Year.
articles.title: Sports Personality of the Year 2024: Keely Hodgkinson ‘pretty close’ to 800m world record

articles.description: Chelsea winger Mykhailo Mudryk has failed a drugs test, with an "adverse finding" in a routine urine sample, the club confirms.
articles.title: Mykhailo Mudryk: Chelsea winger fails drugs test

articles.description: Swedish pole vaulter Armand Duplantis is named BBC Sports Personality's World Sport Star of the Year for 2024.
articles.title: Sports Personality of the Year 2024: Armand Duplantis named World Sport Star

articles.title: PDC World Darts Championship 2025 results: Peter Wright wins, Ryan Meikle beats Fallon Sherrock
